vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Ζαχαρίας, -ου, ὁ (Heb. זַכַּי);
__1. Zacharias, father of John the Baptist: Luk.1:5, 12-13 1:18, 21 1:40, 59 1:67 3:2.
__2. Zechariah, the son of Jehoiada (in txt. wrongly called son of Barachiah; cf. 2Ch.24:19 ff.): Mat.23:35, Luk.11:51.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.24.20;
son of: Jehoiada (H3077H)
vocabinfos._es_Definition: Zacarías: (1) padre de Juan el Bautista ; (2) profeta del AT (MAT.23:35; LUC.11:51)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
撒迦利亞 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "被耶和華紀念"
1) 施洗約翰的父親
2) 巴拉加的兒子
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
撒迦利亚 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "被耶和华纪念"
1) 施洗约翰的父亲
2) 巴拉加的儿子
vocabinfos._vi_Definition: Xa-cha-ri « Đức Giê-hô-va đã nhớ đến » Xem H2148

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Luk.1.5; married to Elizabeth (G1665);
father of: John (G2491)
